mapper.select: select t.totalPeople,t.totalPrice,to_char(t.totalDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') totalDate,f.filmPrice from total t,film f where f.filmName=#{filmName} and t.filmNum = f.filmNum order by t.totalDate

select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieUrl,mi.movieImgUrl,SUM(m.mScore) vg from mReview m,film f,movieImg mi where f.filmNum=m.filmNum and f.filmNum=mi.filmNum group by f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieUrl,mi.movieImgUrl order by vg desc ) aa ) where rnum<=4

select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select f.filmName,f.filmHead,t.totalpeople,mr.likeTotal,mr.mScore,m.memName,m.memId,mr.rContent from total t,film f,mReview mr,membership m where totalpeople = (select MAX(totalpeople) from total where to_char(totaldate,'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yy/mm/dd')) and t.totalpeople = (select MAX(totalpeople) from total where to_char(totaldate,'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yy/mm/dd')) and f.filmNum = t.filmNum and f.filmNum=mr.filmNum and m.memNum = mr.memNum order by mr.likeTotal desc ) aa ) where rnum<=5;
